links.title: Help
links.body: Check out our documentation to learn more about MinIO

links.title: Identity and Access Management
links.body: Learn how MinIO manages Authentication and  Authorization to protect data against  unwanted access

docs.header: How long should the Object remain in the specified mode?

links.title: How long should the Object remain in the specified mode?
links.body: Set the time duration for which an Object is subject to the rules of its retention mode
